title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Rams winning the Super Bowl over the Bengals and the obvious reason they ended up on top in this game. After Matthew Stafford finally adds a Super Bowl title to his resume, Colin compares him to other all time greats and how he ranks against them. He also tells you why he was right about the Rams and wrong about Carson Wentz. Plus, Hall of Famer and co-host of Undisputed Shannon Sharpe joins the show in studio to explain why the Bengals have no reason to complain about the officiating in the Super Bowl after their loss. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
